price: Nítorí náà, ó pe Olúwa rẹ̀ pé dájúdájú àwọn wọ̀nyí ni ìjọ ẹlẹ́sẹ̀.
arabic: فَدَعَا رَبَّهُۥٓ أَنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ قَوۡمٞ مُّجۡرِمُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: fadaʿā rabbahu anna hāulāi qawmun muj'rimūna
